column3: Can you give a short explanation why to delete? :+1: \n

@instagibbs I could not find any reason to keep it.

To me this looks:
- unmaintained (uses deprecated features)
- unused (better alternatives exist)
- untested (has bugs)
- promotes address reuse
- allows to send "free" transactions without warning
I wasn't even aware it existed. Thanks for cleaning up.\n
